extension.description: Professional language support for KUKA Robot Language (KRL) in VS Code
config.title: KUKA KRL Extension
config.autoFold.description: Automatically fold all regions when opening a KRL file
config.indentWidth.description: Number of spaces for indentation (3 = KUKA Teach Pendant standard)
config.separateBeforeBlocks.description: Add empty line before control blocks (FOR, IF, WHILE, LOOP, etc.)
config.separateAfterBlocks.description: Add empty line after control blocks (ENDFOR, ENDIF, ENDWHILE, etc.)
config.validateNonAscii.description: Highlight non-ASCII characters (Cyrillic, special symbols) that may cause errors in KUKA controller
view.krlIO.welcome: No I/O signals found in the current workspace. Use $IN[n], $OUT[n], etc. in your KRL code to see them here.
